Listen up @DefraGovUK, @NaturalEngland, @EnvAgency...following the passing of the Agriculture Act 2020 into law, I'm keen on launching a #BackTheBuffer campaign, calling for the implementation of buffer strips around UK waterways. This will provide a number of important benefits.

https://t.co/N3u3qgqqi9

" In order to prevent microplastics from entering the aquatic environment, wastewater treatment plants remove microplastics from the wastewater but thus concentrate them in the sludge subsequently used as a fertilizer on agricultural soils"

https://t.co/vzbcWGeHri
